lead_paragraph: Cedric Benson’s rocky tenure with the Chicago Bears became rockier Saturday after he was arrested on drunken-driving charges in Austin, Tex., his second arrest in just more than a month. Benson’s lawyer, Sam Bassett, said, “He’s probably in trouble with his team for breaking curfew and having anything to drink under the circumstances.” Benson was charged last month with boating while intoxicated and resisting arrest.
